name: The_Cube_Test
description:
This game might look terrible in the outside (and inside), but that's what the game wants you to think. The game will do anything to make itself unplayable. Luckily, I (the dev) have added hints, since each level plays differently.  The goal also helps you out.

- Spikes with its own feelings towards you.

- Platforms that love you when either close by, or away.

- And other stuff a regular platformer usually has.

Will the game take your control away, or is it you who will be taking control?
